title: FT3 Framework
description: Fraud Tools, Tactics, and Techniques (FT3) is Stripe's adaptation of ATT&CK-style security frameworks, specifically designed to enhance our understanding of the tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) used by actors in fraudulent activities. Developed as a resource for combating financial crime and improving organizational fraud prevention, FT3 serves a variety of stakeholders across the Fraud ecosystem.
short_description: FT3 is a fraud framework by Stripe that provides a structured taxonomy of fraud tactics and techniques, similar to MITRE ATT&CK but focused on fraud prevention and detection.
